file_content.text: Gonna have some new scars after this....
Please, doc, you gotta help me. I don't want to die!
I'm trying to help you. You need to calm down... wait. What's a Jedi doing here?
A Jedi relic may have passed through this warehouse.
I'm looking for an artifact.
A relic, you say. Well, unfortunately, I can guess just where it is.
You're doing surgery?
I'm trying to save his life!
This gang has something I need. Stay back and you'll be alright.
I'm after the Black Sun.
Those Black Sun thugs. They call me in to clean up a botched operation, and I find this!
They're smuggling contraband offworld--old Jedi junk, data discs--inside people's bodies!
I want the word to go out: The Black Sun stop this, or the Jedi will stop them.
This butchery ends now.
I think they got the message when their smugglers started dying.
How horrific.
The Black Sun pay their thugs to carry them, get their stolen relics out and nobody's any the wiser.
Very cunning.
A Justicar... those vigilantes from the lower city. One of them paid big to get this stuff offworld quiet-like--especially some "Noetikon."
The Justicar's name... he was... Lars something. Lars Baddeg.
Lars Baddeg gave the Gand another Noetikon to keep safe. He must be behind all this.
I know that name.
You said Lars Baddeg wanted the Noetikon offworld. Has it left Coruscant?
Where's the Noetikon now?
Nuhh... no. Not yet.
Where can I find Lars Baddeg? Why is he doing this?
Tell me everything you know.
I don't... I don't know! Please....
The smugglers... nnnggh... can't get the paperwork to go offworld. They're still here--still hurting....
Those smugglers are dying, Jedi. I need that contraband out of them, but I have my hands full here. Can you help?
Just tell me what I need to do.
Of course.
Perhaps one of those smugglers is carrying the relic I need.
If it will find the Noetikon.
These people chose their fate when they handed themselves over to the Black Sun.
Why should I?
They were desperate to get offworld! Look, there's Jedi relics inside them--maybe you care about those?
The object I found in this man had a magnetic ID tag, which means that the Black Sun must have scanners to identify their smugglers.
You should find one in the other room. And grab some medical supplies--maybe we can keep these men alive.
